AccountName.description: The name of the Bing Ads account.

AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the Bing Ads account.

AccountId.description: The unique identifier of the Bing Ads account.

TimePeriod.description: The time period of the data.

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group.

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group.

AdId.description: The unique identifier of the ad.

AdType.description: The type of ad (text ad, responsive ad, etc.).

DestinationUrl.description: The URL where the ad directs traffic.

BidMatchType.description: The type of match (bidded, auto, etc.) for the keyword bid.

DeliveredMatchType.description: The type of match (exact, broad, etc.) for the keyword delivery.

Impressions.description: The total number of times the ad was shown.

Spend.description: The total spend on the ad.

AveragePosition.description: The average position of the ad on search results pages.

SearchQuery.description: The search query that triggered the ad.

Keyword.description: The keyword associated with the ad.

AdGroupCriterionId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group criterion.

ConversionRate.description: The percentage of clicks that resulted in a conversion.

Language.description: The language setting targeted by the ad.

KeywordId.description: The unique identifier of the keyword.

Network.description: The network where the ad was shown (Bing, partner sites, etc.).

TopVsOther.description: Indicates if the ad was shown in the top position or elsewhere.

DeviceType.description: The type of device (desktop, mobile, tablet, etc.).

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device where the ad was displayed.

Assists.description: The number of assists on conversions.

CostPerAssist.description: The cost per assist on conversions.

AccountStatus.description: The status of the Bing Ads account.

AdGroupStatus.description: The status of the ad group.

CampaignType.description: The type of campaign (search, display, etc.).

CustomerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer.

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from all conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: The percentage of all clicks that resulted in a conversion.

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for all conversions.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversions.

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The average revenue per conversion for all conversions.

Goal.description: The goal associated with the campaign.

GoalType.description: The type of goal (e.g., ROAS, CPA) for the campaign.

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of impressions shown at the absolute top of the search results page.

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of impressions shown at the top of the search results page.

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions.

ConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified conversions.

AllConversionsQualified.description: The total number of qualified conversions.
